snippet: The State Supreme Court says voters will be able to consider making liquor sales legal statewide.
abstract: Arkansas State Supreme Court says voters will be able to consider making liquor sales legal statewide.
lead_paragraph: The State Supreme Court says voters will be able to consider making liquor sales legal statewide.

headline.main: Arkansas: Vote on Liquor Sales Is Cleared for Ballot
headline.print_headline: Arkansas: Vote on Liquor Sales Is Cleared for Ballot
